eu.ehri.project.core.impl

Class Neo4jGraphManager<T extends Neo4j2Graph>

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.ehri.project.core.impl.BlueprintsGraphManager<T>
      • eu.ehri.project.core.impl.Neo4jGraphManager<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GraphManager

    public final class Neo4jGraphManager<T extends Neo4j2Graph>
extends BlueprintsGraphManager<T>
    Implementation of GraphManager that uses a single index to manage all nodes, with Neo4j Lucene query optimisations.
